tool_description: Segments users based on behavior patterns, purchase history, and engagement metrics for targeted recovery campaigns and personalization.

user_id.description: Unique identifier for the user to segment

purchase_history_days.description: Days of purchase history to consider

error_messages: Invalid user_id: Must be a non-empty string
Invalid purchase_history_days: Must be between 30 and 730 days
Invalid behavior_data: Must contain valid behavior event strings
Insufficient data: User has insufficient interaction history for segmentation
usage: Classify users into segments by providing user_id and behavior_data. Optionally specify purchase_history_days for more accurate segmentation.
